API to update website setup status.
Note status will only increase, not decrease.
Mark the website as setup completed (No WebsiteStatusGuardMixin)

Restart admin setup, To to 3.0 and delete approval (No WebsiteStatusGuardMixin)

username.description: Required. 150 characters or fewer. Letters, digits and @/./+/-/_ only.

is_active.description: Designates whether this user should be treated as active. Unselect this instead of deleting accounts.

is_staff.description: Designates whether the user can log into this admin site.

is_superuser.description: Designates that this user has all permissions without explicitly assigning them.
